get.description: Retrieves a list of available tag types.  Required Permissions: Read-Only Assets, Read-Write Assets

parameters.name: maxReturn
parameters.description: Maximum number of channels to return.  Max 200, default 20

folder.description: JSON representation of parent folder, with members 'id', and 'type' which may be 'Folder' or 'Program'

operational.description: Whether the email is operational.  Operational emails bypass unsubscribe status.  Defaults to false

published.description: Whether the email has been published to Sales Insight.  Default false

textOnly.description: Setting to include text-only version of email when sent

webView.description: Whether the email has been enabled to allow the 'View as Web Page' when received

hostname.description: The hostname for the landing pages.  Branding domain or alias.  Max 255 characters

redirectFrom.description: JSON representation of redirect from landing page, with members 'type' which may be 'landingPageId' or 'path', and 'value'

redirectTo.description: JSON representation of redirect to landing page, with members 'type' which may be 'landingPageId' or 'url', and 'value'

hostname.description: The hostname for the landing pages.  Branding domain or alias.  Max 255 characters

redirectTo.description: JSON representation of redirect to landing page, with members 'type' which may be 'landingPageId' or 'url', and 'value'

costs.description: Lists of associated period costs that allow you to append, replace, or delete. To append new costs, simply add them to costs array.  To replace costs (destructive update), pass new costs and set costsDestructiveUpdate to true. To delete costs, do not pass costs parameter and set costsDestructiveUpdate to true

costsDestructiveUpdate.description: Set true to destroy existing costs and replace them with the specified costs

moduleScope.description: Returns true for local variables else returns false

id.description: Id of the smart campaign (system managed)

type.description: Type of the smart campaign. Batch: has at least one filter and no triggers. Trigger: has at least one trigger. Default: has no smart list rules

isSystem.description: Whether smart campaign is system managed.  Defaults to false

isActive.description: Whether smart campaign is active.  Defaults to false

isRequestable.description: Whether smart campaign is requestable (is active and contains 'Campaign is Requested' trigger with Source of 'Web Service API').  Defaults to false

recurrence.description: Recurrence schedule of batch smart campaign

qualificationRuleType.description: Type of qualification rule.  Defaults to 'once'

qualificationRuleInterval.description: Interval of qualification rule.  Only set when qualificationRuleType is 'interval'

qualificationRuleUnit.description: Unit of measure of qualification rule.  Only set when qualificationRuleType is 'interval'

isCommunicationLimitEnabled.description: Whether smart campaign communication limit is enabled (i.e. block non-operational emails).  Defaults to false

smartListId.description: Id of the smart campaign's child smart list

flowId.description: Id of the smart campaign's child flow

parentProgramId.description: Parent program Id.  Present if smart campaign is under program or nested folder

startAt.description: Datetime of the first scheduled campaign to run. Required if setting recurrence. Not required to create a smart campaign that has no recurrence

endAt.description: Datetime after which no further runs will be automatically scheduled

intervalType.description: Recurrence interval. Not required to create a smart campaign that has no recurrence

interval.description: Number of interval units between recurrences

weekdayOnly.description: Only run smart campaign on weekdays. May only be set if intervalType is 'Daily'.  Defaults to false

weekdayMask.description: String array of empty or one or more of 'Monday', 'Tuesday', 'Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday', 'Sunday'. May only be set if intervalType is 'Weekly'

dayOfMonth.description: Day of the month to recur. Permissible range 1-31. May only be set if intervalType is 'Monthly' and dayOfWeek and weekOfMonth are unset.

dayOfWeek.description: Day of the week to recur. May only be set if dayOfMonth is not set, and weekOfMonth is set

weekOfMonth.description: Week of the month to recur. Permissible range 1-4. May only be set if dayOfMonth is not set, and dayOfWeek is set
